author: Eric Diep
title: This #StrandedBae Story About Love and Infidelity Is the Craziest Thing You'll Read Today
text:
This #StrandedBae Story About Love and Infidelity Is the Craziest Thing You'll Read Today By Eric Diep E. Diep is a contributing writer at Complex Media.
More info: Twitter / linkedin / Facebook / Google+ 
Feb   Image via Twitter If youâ€™re single on Valentineâ€™s Day, thereâ€™s a chance youâ€™re looking for someone to spend it with so you donâ€™t feel lonely. Youâ€™ve probably heard thousands of crazy dating stories from your friends and family, but this one that emerged on Twitter last night has to be the wildest. Filled with love, deceit, and sudden twists, youâ€™re seriously in for a treat.
It starts with Twitter user @_iamqueenk alluding to a story about a very unfortunate incident that involved her bae, @KashMoneyKanee. At first, she hesitates to give us the full story, but slowly shares bits and pieces of what happened. What we know so far: @KashMoneyKanee was someone that she was into, but he flipped on her quick during a Valentineâ€™s Day getaway.
I wanna make a thread about all this shit & really get twitter live bu ....
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 19, 2017 Lord please be with me ğŸ™ğŸ¾ 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 19, 2017 Lmao this man made sure his friends had a place to stay but left his girl stranded. What type of nigga does that ğŸ¤” 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 19, 2017 It just be so funny cause it be the mfs speaking so hard on loyalty who don't have a lick of loyalty in them ğŸ’€ 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 19, 2017 Don't get in a relationship if you not ready for all the shit it comes with. Period. Stop wasting people time.
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 19, 2017 In the full thread, @_iamqueenk tells it all. How @KashMoneyKanee paid for her flight and stay in Washington D.C. How he paid for everything and even made matching T-shirts with her face on it. And how he suddenly decided to ditch her at the airport for his friends, partying, and another woman.
I wasn't gone do the most for twitter but I been played like a damn fool all day by this man lol @KashMoneyKanee . So here it goes.
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee soooo , me and this been in love with eachother , planning life goals and shit. Planning trips, ya know stuff like that
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so he lives in D.C. & decided to fly me out there for Valentine's Day, paid for the flights, you know the whole package. pic.twitter.com/ c5aFMbPibf 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee the mice in his house already was tryna give me a sign that he was no good :( pic.twitter.com/ TkdmmS7LBe 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so this nigga surprised me & got this tshirt made, I was like oh shit this nigga really all about me. Okay bet. pic.twitter.com/ mocujdL8Ba 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so I fly out there everything perfect, nigga paid for everything, vday was perfect. Okay cool. Oh & we had matching shirts pic.twitter.com/ YVZTplBiXr 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so fast foward I miss my flight & he says "babe imma come back & get u when I leave work" okay cool keep in mind this at 3pm 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee bitc 7 hours go by I still haven't heard from this nigga , I'm still at the airport pic.twitter.com/ dtvNcKZcJQ 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so I'm worried bitch, I'm hitting his friends up tryna see where he at: nobody knows pic.twitter.com/ OdrVT2HMz8 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee soooo I end up stranded at the airport, it's like 4am & I see this.... this nigga on sc with his niggas pic.twitter.com/ An98MpRfu2 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so bitch I'm heated, been at the airport for damn near 10 hours while he out partying. Bitch hungry, cold, I'm stressed pic.twitter.com/ 8wWxUnzPA1 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so I'm blowing his phone up, nigga ignoring me & then I see this pic.twitter.com/ 9nDoOGRe81 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee the same friends I was reaching out to looking for him worried, was with him all along pic.twitter.com/ jKL91aFk3g 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so bitch at this point I'm ready to buss his windows & beat his friends ass. Ion even play them type of games pic.twitter.com/ IUTOR48jgZ 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so bitch I catch a cab to this nigga house, ready to beat ass. pic.twitter.com/ LT8fnCj9e8 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee so I go up to the door bangin on that bitch, it's like 5am . All his friends there but nobody answering the doorğŸ¤” 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee bitch after 20 mins of knocking I go outside, bitch the police in the front of the house. pic.twitter.com/ 2KswsMUYYW 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee this nigga tell the police he don't want me back n his house, so they make me leave ğŸ™„ 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee this nigga still ignoring my calls, texts & all. Hours later he text me like "you ate?" Like nigga you left me for dead... pic.twitter.com/ eGAg8HZ6dI 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee I got on sc & seen he posted this.... threw that bitch ass bear on the ground. Fuck you & that damn bear pic.twitter.com/ of6eD5gFZO 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee nigga still ignoring me. Talking shit on twitter but still didn't give me an explanation. So I'm confused why he did this
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee hours later I see this... BITC BITC GHHKZKSKSJBSHSJISNSBS pic.twitter.com/ YzrEHwvN66 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 @KashMoneyKanee bitch I feel like keke in brotherly love. Lmfao this nigga played tf outta me. pic.twitter.com/ jeSAXlnKIx 
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 Now, to be fair, @KashMoneyKanee drops his side of the story. He claims @_iamqueenk found out she was getting evicted while she was visiting him. He says she was trying to convince him to let her stay, but he wasnâ€™t having it. The story intensifies as @KashMoneyKanee recalls her coming to his house on a cab fare she couldnâ€™t pay for to harass him. When @_iamqueenkâ€™s mother gets involved, you know this is getting out of hand.
OKAY YALL , LETS TALK ABOUT WHAT REALLY HAPPENED....
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 so @__iamqueenk slid in a nigga dms nshit .. and we get to talking.. texting... face timing err' night nshit .
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 FIRST OF ALL, WHO GOES ANYWHERE WITHOUT ANY MONEY? But anyways , I fucked & everything went left
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 Bih started finding my family on facebook , messaging my mama, my sister, all my friends like... THIS BITCH REALLY CRAZY pic.twitter.com/ OGtOzNHH2w 
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 So Shorty finds out she's getting evicted from her place while she's out here visiting me... and I'm like... pic.twitter.com/ fFaC9ls91R 
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 TRYNA TALK ABOUT RATS AND SHIT. WHERE YA CRIB?
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 So anyways , It's time to take her to the airport and she catches a whole attitude.. then hits me with "You know I don't have anywhere to go
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 So I drop her off at the the airport, EARLY ENOUGH TO CATCH HER FLIGHT, & she misses it on purpose.. along with all the other flights pic.twitter.com/ BV42LKwzPw 
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 Blowing my phone up, my friends social media, messaging my mama, calling my sister, trying to get me to pick her up... FOR WHAT THO ?!
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 There's the good part though....
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 It's 5 am, I'm fucking the life out of a bih , mid nut I hear her banging on my door yelling and screaming...
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 @__iamqueenk took a cab all the way back to my house with no money to pay the man, tryna come for me... GO HOME ROGER
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 anyways , the police gets called because this bitch really needs to go... Bitch bout to go to jail for larceny nshit because I'm not paying
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 for her cab fair.... My nigga ends up paying it & police end up escorting her away from my house...
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 at this point, I'm done with this crazy ass bitch...
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 got her mama DM me nshit ... pic.twitter.com/ yclqbYKMar 
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 fam we met like 4 weeks ago... THE PUSSY WAS NOT EVEN ALL THAT TO BE GOING THROUGH ALL THIS...
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 She basically wanted me to be captain save a hoe & I really just didn't want to spend my Valentine's Day alone... The end.
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 Twitter was so into the story that there have been imaginary threads telling different perspectives. Probably the funniest one is hearing what parody account @HurtMouse has to say. The running joke here is that @_iamqueenk already thought @KashMoneyKanee was suspect because he had mice in his home. This is too much.
My door broke, no food in the fridge, ugly busted hoes walking around the crib with fake bears. A young mouse is fed up cuhh !! pic.twitter.com/ sLphz9FCwb 
â€” HurtMouse ( @HurtMouse ) February 20, 2017 Their takes on #mousegate:
that nigga tried to act surprised when I told him them damn mice was out to get in his house. Bitch you knew.
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017 bitch it came through my chimney... this is all coming from a bitch that just got evicted & left by her family... just chill. https://t.co/ PcvLKpx1S0 
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 I'm not making excuses for it but a lot of people talkin about this rat in my crib like they don't still stay with they mamas. Lol
â€” 1017Swervo ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¿ ( @KashMoneyKanee ) February 20, 2017 Both are still reeling from last nightâ€™s reactions from Twitter. @KashMoneyKanee had a very dude response to the whole thing, while @_iamqueenk just wants to move on. But honestly, this beats soap opera TV any day.
a message from @KashMoneyKanee pic.twitter.com/ 56oe1b1Lcb 
â€” GregğŸ•Š ( @flashgreg_ ) February 20, 2017 I just really hope everybody know idgaf , so if you hop in my mentions still talking shit I'm blocking you.... ğŸ˜Š
â€” $ ( @__iamqueenk ) February 20, 2017   Twitter
